messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Growth of this group
messages.msgSnippet: On the new members counts, that includes resubscribes.  Pretty frequently people change e-mail accounts so it looks like someone left and a new person joined
messages.messageBody:
On the new members counts, that includes resubscribes. Pretty frequently
people change e-mail accounts so it looks like someone left and a new person
joined but it was just a switch of address. Same, basically, if someone goes off
the list while on vacation or moving, and then re-ups.

I think this list has been over 1200 for a year or two, and hasn't ever hit
1300.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Growth of this group
messages.msgSnippet: ... We had 1222 members on September 1st. We have 1272 right now. -pam National Home Education Network  Serving the entire homeschooling
messages.messageBody:
On Nov 14, 2003, at 10:29 AM, Teresa wrote:

> Sept, Oct, Nov 03 - 155 new members (as of today)
> June, July Aug 03 - 149 new members
> March, April, May 03 - 289
> Dec, Jan, Feb 02-03 - 222 new members
> Sept, Oct, Nov, 02 - 182 new members.
>
> I can not find out how many members unsubscribed in those months,
> those figures are for mods and owners only.

We had 1222 members on September 1st. We have 1272 right now.

-pam
National Home Education Network
<www.NHEN.org>
Serving the entire homeschooling community since 1999
through information, networking and public relations.

messages.subject: Growth of this group
messages.msgSnippet: Just out of curiousity, I did a little research.. Here are the results for the growth of this group over the past year New Ownership took place on Aug 31, so
messages.messageBody:
Just out of curiousity, I did a little research.. Here are the
results for the growth of this group over the past year

New Ownership took place on Aug 31, so the first set of number is
indicative of growth since new ownership.


Sept, Oct, Nov 03 - 155 new members (as of today)
June, July Aug 03 - 149 new members
March, April, May 03 - 289
Dec, Jan, Feb 02-03 - 222 new members
Sept, Oct, Nov, 02 - 182 new members.

I can not find out how many members unsubscribed in those months,
those figures are for mods and owners only.

Teresa
